metadata.description: UI/UX design intelligence skill with 107 styles, 127 palettes, 107 font pairings, 106 charts, 131 reasoning rules, and 16 stack guidelines. Includes 8 Python scripts and 1,875+ searchable data rows.

plugins.name: ui-ux-design-pro
plugins.description: Professional UI/UX design intelligence for AI coding assistants. Data-driven architecture with BM25 search engine, WCAG/APCA contrast checker, color palette generator, CSS token generator, type scale calculator, design system generator, and UI auditor. Includes searchable databases of styles, colors, typography, charts, reasoning rules, and UX guidelines for React, Next.js, Astro, Vue, Nuxt.js, Nuxt UI, Svelte, Angular, Remix, SolidJS, SwiftUI, React Native, Flutter, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, and Jetpack Compose.
